channel.title: It won't work on a client!
channel.description: i can't figure out where you find the Ip of the server, I've looked in every file, what file is it suppost to be in?

item.title: It won't work on a client!
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

public final void init() { try { anInt957 = 10; anInt958 = 0; method52(true); aBoolean959 = true; signlink.storeid = 32; signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); setserver("crystalscape.sytes.net", "43594"); method2(503, false, 765); }

would that work in the whole client.java thing? or do I have to edit the signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); thing too? if so, to what?

Read full topic
item.source: It won't work on a client!

item.title: It won't work on a client!
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

in client.java search for

    public final void init() {

you should see somthing like

public final void init() { try { anInt957 = 0; anInt958 = 0; method52(true); aBoolean959 = true; signlink.storeid = 32; signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); setserver("serverip", "serverport"); method2(503, false, 765); } catch (Exception exception) { return; } }

and also search for

    public static final void main(String args[]) {

and you should see somthing like

[code] public static final void main(String args[]) {
try {

        anInt957 = 0;
        anInt958 = 0;
        method52(false); // highmem
        aBoolean959 = true; // members
        signlink.storeid = 32;
        signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost());
        client client1 = new client();

        client1.method1(503, false, 765);
        setserver("serverip", "serverport");
        return;
    } catch (Exception exception) {
        return;
    }
}[/code]

Read full topic

client.java or gui.java usually has the ip of the server.

okay, I don’t have a Gui.Java file, and I looked all through client.java, and nothing… where would it be in there??
